author: Daria Wilen
content: I am very much concern about my online privacy. I was using CyberGhost VPN but do not found it more reliable. Now i switched to "Hotspot Shield" VPN which is available at free for secure web surfing sessions and to bypass desired filters and firewalls. This VPN is more fast, safe and convenient to use at public wifi hotspots. Check it out here - http://www.hotspotshield.com
